channel.title: Zotero on Carpentry at the University of Oslo
channel.description: Recent content in Zotero on Carpentry at the University of Oslo

item.title: Zotero Add-Ons, Extensions, and Plugins
item.description: Workalong: Zotero Add-Ons, Extensions, and Plugins # Session leader: Annika Rockenberger Level: beginner When: Thursday, May 14 Time: 16:00-18:00 Location: Niels Henrik Abels hus Room 209 What’s happening? We meet and together we explore a couple of add-ons, plugins and extensions for Zotero. If you know a cool add-on, please bring it and show us how to use it! Come with your laptop â€“ it’s probably a good idea to have Zotero installed.
